Changes.LogName: Juliet reminds you of the event

Entries.{{season}}_{{day}}_2: $1 Juliet_TalentShowReminder#Hey farmer! Don't forget the talent show! It's at the Community Center this afternoon.#$b#And you don't wanna miss out on the fun! It's gonna be a RIOT! Of the good kind, not the destructive kind - I hope.$1
